title: Refunds
body: People should get more refunds they should be able to buy them or earn 1 refund every 5 or 10 levels mainly so when u buy someone for the first time and don't like them your not stuck with them

replies.body: Not sure if you know this, but Level 30 is the max level one can achieve. A popular proposed idea was to give 3 new refund tokens every season. The logic behind leaving it at 3 refund tokens for life is that eventually, you will get all the champion content anyways, and you should be trying champions out on freeroll. Yes, you may not like your Karma purchase, but if you keep playing and get all the champs anyways, why would you need a refund token?
Yes but umm lvl 30 is the maximum and lvl and I agree there should be more refunds but  I think we should be able to buy them with IP

I was just thinking myself it should be 3 refunds every year/season (guess it's the same thing). I know I made a rash decision on my second ever day playing buying a champion with RP, so I refunded. I didn't know the game as well then as I do now even as much to know you earn IP and can use that. Either way, for whatever reasons, 3 refunds for entirety is not right.
riot needs to make like every season they give u more 3 refunds
